Cracked Core.NAME: Lightning core
Cracked Core.FLAVOR: The Lightning core is the crazy side of the robot, representing the power of taboo and madness.

FrozenCore.NAME: Frozen Core
FrozenCore.FLAVOR: The frozen core is the cool side of the robot, representing the power of kindness and gentleness.
DESCRIPTIONS: #bFrozen #bCore(Right) :If you end your turn with any empty Orb slots, #yChannel #b1 #yFrost.
